Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 10th sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show commanders and fighters together.The Mao quotation reads "On the basis of people's war, on the principles of unity between the army and the people, unity between commanders and combatants, and the disintegration of enemy forces, the People's Liberation Army has established its own powerful revolutionary political work, which is the significant factor of our victory over the enemy".
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
